body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours     Backpacking Services                Overnight Backpacking Businesses       A commercial use-authorization from the park is required to guide trips in Yellowstone National Park. The businesses listed below are authorized to guide overnight backcountry trips in Yellowstone.      B Big Wild Adventures — (406) 848-7000 D Dead Drift Adventures — (406) 539-4239 F Fish the Fly Guide Service and Travel — (307) 690-1139 Fitpacking — (781) 773-1115 G Geyser Kayak Yellowstone LLC — (307) 413-6177 Greater Yellowstone Flyfishers — (406) 585-5321 Grizzly Guy, Inc. — (406) 794-6812 J Jackson Hole Kayak School — (307) 733-2471 L Lillard Fly Fishing Expeditions — (828) 577-8204 M Menogyn — (612) 822-2267 N National Outdoor Leadership Schools — (NOLS) (307) 332-1425 O Outpost Wilderness Adventures — (512) 731-7596 Overland Travel, Inc. — (413) 458-9672 S Shurr Adventures — (239) 300-3004 Sun Valley Trekking Company (208) 788-1966 T Teton High Adventure Base — (307) 733-8242 The Wild Side — (406) 223-6778 The Wildland Trekking Company — 800-715-4453 Trail Guides Yellowstone — (406) 595-1823 Turpin Meadow Ranch — (307) 543-2000 W Wilderness Alternative Schools — (406) 854-2832 Wilderness Inquiry — (612) 676-9400 Wilderness Ventures — (307) 733-2122 or 800-533-2281 Y Yellowstone Guidelines — (406) 599-2960 Yellowstone Safari — (406) 586-1155 Yellowstone Tour Guides — 888-493-2260 or 406-995-2399
title: Yellowstone National Park: Backpacking Services
